job_tasks.phrase: As an AI/ML Full Stack Engineer, at AND Digital you'll act as a hands on, Engineer working across a Club's portfolio of clients, onsite and in multi-skilled agile delivery teams.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the general role of a hands-on engineer working within agile teams, which is a core aspect of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates guiding and supporting other developers, a common task in software engineering teams, especially for senior roles.

job_tasks.phrase: Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves mentoring and developing team members' technical skills, which falls under the broader umbrella of software engineering team leadership and development.

job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.
job_tasks.justification: This describes client-facing work related to the implementation and strategy of machine learning, which involves integrating solutions and understanding business needs within a software context.
This directly refers to knowledge of MLOps, which is about managing and deploying ML systems in production.

job_tasks.phrase: Understanding of the mathematical foundations of ML algorithms.
job_tasks.justification: This points to a deep understanding of how ML models work, which is a core part of model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience in building and maintaining RESTFul ML model APIs
job_tasks.justification: This task involves creating and managing APIs for ML models, which is a key aspect of integrating ML into software applications.

soft_skills.phrase: Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues.
soft_skills.justification: This implies guiding and supporting team members, which is a form of collaboration and technical mentorship.

soft_skills.phrase: Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights a supportive and guiding role within a team, emphasizing collaboration and skill development.

soft_skills.phrase: Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly mentions working closely with clients, which requires strong communication and collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Experience with AI/ML toolkits and libraries. Particularly; PyTorch, Transformers, Gradio, Jupyter Notebook, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn.
soft_skills.justification: The requirement to be experienced with a range of AI/ML toolkits and libraries implies a need for continuous learning and adaptation to new tools.

soft_skills.phrase: help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.
soft_skills.justification: The act of implementing, reviewing, and remediating strategies suggests a problem-solving approach to client needs.

profile.rationale: The job ad emphasizes traditional ML tasks and tools (PyTorch, Scikit-Learn, Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib) and mentions building/maintaining RESTful ML model APIs, which aligns with Macro-Category A (Software Development & Integration). It also includes understanding of ML algorithms and MLOps best practices (Macro-Category A and B). There is no mention of Generative AI specific tasks like LLMs, RAG, or prompt engineering. The role involves guiding junior developers and working with clients on ML strategies, indicating a balanced mix of A and B, but with a clear focus on traditional ML rather than GenAI.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly lists specific traditional ML tools and tasks, as well as MLOps and API development. However, it lacks explicit mention of Generative AI, making the distinction between a Core ML Engineer and an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer slightly less definitive than it could be if GenAI was explicitly excluded or included. The 'AI/ML Full Stack Engineer' title is broad, but the listed technologies and tasks lean heavily towards traditional ML.
